snippet: A call for a special legislative session by Gov. John W. Hickenlooper could revive a bill that would have allowed civil unions for same-sex couples in Colorado.
abstract: Colorado Gov John W Hickenlooper calls for a special legislative session to revive a bill that would have allowed civil unions for same-sex couples in the state; bill's supporters have accused state's Republican legislative leadership of stalling on other unrelated matters, causing debate on the bill to pass a deadline.
lead_paragraph: A call for a special legislative session by Gov. John W. Hickenlooper could revive a bill that would have allowed civil unions for same-sex couples in Colorado.

headline.seo: Civil Union Bill May Be Revived in Colorado
headline.main: Call for Legislature to Revive Colorado’s Civil Union Bill
headline.print_headline: Call for Legislature to Revive Colorado’s Civil Union Bill

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
